metadata.title: CVE-2020-14399 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13.Byte-aligned data is accessed through uint32_t pointers inlibvncclient/rfbproto.c. NOTE: there is reportedly "no trust boundarycrossed."

criterions.comment: libvncserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
x11vnc package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
